AbanteCart Payments Configuration

Extensions > Payments

Payment Extensions give the store owner a way to interface with several established companies for credit card processing.
Every payment method in AbanteCart is presented as Extension and in order to access these you will need to login into the admin area of your installation. Then you should navigate to Extensions > Payments.
Once you access the Extensions page you will find the Payments extension list. Then you will need to click on the small “play” like icon under the “Quick Actions” column of the table view. This action will install the extension and will lead you to the configuration page for the same where you need to configure additional options.

We recommend to explore Stripe and PayPal payments. These are most common and well supported payment methods.

Core AbanteCart Payments

Some of the listed modules have additional settings depending on the functionality of the payment module that need adjusting.

Stripe Payment Gateway

Payments from start to finish. Stripe a flexible set of tools and functionality for modern commerce.

PayPal Payments Standard

Online credit card processing & website payments are simple with PayPal Payments Standard.

PayPal Payments Pro

PayPal Payments Pro is an affordable website payment processing solution for businesses with 100+ orders/month

PayPal Payments Pro (UK)

Ready to pay your suppliers or withdraw to any UK bank account.

Cheque / Money Order

As an alternate form of payment to credit cards, customers may pay for their order using a check or money order.

PayPal Express Checkout

Allow your customer to checkout from any page on your website bypassing address entry and account sign up..

Authorize.Net (AIM)

Payment gateway enables internet merchants to accept online payments via credit card

Payza (AlertPay)

Your customers can pay you instantly using their e-wallet or their credit card.

Realex

Realex Payments is Europe's payment gateway of choice for 12500 corporate & business clients, processing secure payments with superior customer service.

LIQPAY

Payment platform, designed by Ukrainian PrivatBank specialists, combining Visa money transfer technology, and advantages of Internet and mobile channels.

WorldPay

Worldpay provides secure payment services for small and large businesses.

2Checkout

2Checkout.com is an online payment processing service that helps you accept credit cards, PayPal and debit cards.

SagePay and SagePay(US)

With Sage, process payments faster to get paid more quickly.

SagePay Direct

Direct Sagepay allows payments without redirect the visitor to a Sagepay web page

PayPoint

Secure online payment & fraud management solutions - multi-platform PCI compliant payment gateway.

Paymate

PayMate offers Simple, safe and efficient B2B payments.

CashFlows

PayMate offers Simple, safe and efficient B2B payments.

Skrill

Skrill is the cheaper way to send and receive money worldwide. Secure and convenient online payments.

Cash On Delivery

COD allows the purchaser to pay at the time of delivery instead of having to pay upfront.

Bank Transfer

It allows you to receive funds directly into your bank account.

Third Party AbanteCart Payments

Extensions are available in Extensions > Get Extensions section or thru browser direct link http://marketplace.abantecart.com

Stripe Advanced

Payments from start to finish. Stripe a flexible set of tools and functionality for modern commerce.

Elavon / Converge

This extension will add Elavon Converge ( Virtual Merchant ) credit card payment to your website.

Cardstream

A trusted Online Payment Gateway partner to thousands of merchants.

Offline Credit Card Processing

Intended to collect customer's credit card details at the time of the order and securely save details for manual processing.

eWAY

eWAY is a fast, secure connection between your website and your bank.

PayU Poland

With PayU, Customers can pay for orders made in PLN (Polish zloty).

Nochex

Accept credit card payments but also Nochex members can pay using their Nochex account.

Note

Third Party Extensions might be free or paid.
